name: sea turtle amigurumi
notes:
crochet sea turtle amigurumi pattern  

this pattern is available for free on my blog - www.loopsandlovecrochet.com. here you are paying to purchase an ad-free version of this crochet pattern with some additional photos and tips/tricks.

this listing is for the pdf crochet pattern for a sea turtle amigurumi and the mini sea turtle amigurumi. you'll get the pdf file for both of these crochet patterns. 

**sea turtle amigurumi** - finished size approx. 6.5 inches from head to tail
**mini sea turtle amigurumi** -  finished size approx. 4.5 inches from head to tail


this pdf pattern includes step-by-step instructions with lots of photos, which makes it easy to follow and also beginner friendly, but still fun for more experienced crocheter. i hope you enjoy making this little turtle as much as i did! 

materials:
•	worsted weight yarn – approx. 60 - 100 yards, depending on sea turtle size 
•	3.5mm (g) crochet hook. 
•	poly-fil/stuffing
•	7 or 9mm safety eyes (depending on sea turtle size)
•	yarn needle for sewing pieces together and weaving in ends. 

if you love ocean themed amigurumi projects, please check out the whole collection in the ocean friends amigurumi listing! you can get all of the ocean amigurumi patterns, including this one, together in one ebook.
